mapper.select: SELECT p.line_no, p.mf_process_code, p.mf_process_name, p.sys_code, f.sys_name, e.emp_name FROM mf_process p LEFT OUTER JOIN facilities f ON p.sys_code = f.sys_code LEFT OUTER JOIN employees e ON f.emp_num = e.emp_num
SELECT f.sys_code, f.sys_name, e.emp_name FROM facilities f JOIN employees e ON f.emp_num = e.emp_num WHERE f.sys_status = '미사용'
